entity.name: TestEntity
entity.query: SELECT DISTINCT B.ID, B.Name as Business, C.Name as City, Convert(varchar, Latitude) + ',' + Convert(varchar, Longitude) as LatLng, Case Rating when 0 then '0/*' when 1 then '0/**' when 2 then '0/***' when 3 then '0/****' when 4 then '0/*****' End as Rating FROM Business B INNER JOIN Location L on B.HeadLocationId = L.ID AND L.Deleted is null INNER JOIN City C on C.ID = L.CityId WHERE B.Deleted is null ORDER BY Rating

entity.name: attributes
entity.query: select name AS Attributes from Attribute A inner join AttributeBusiness [AS] on A.ID = [AS].Attribute_ID where [AS].Business_ID ='${TestEntity.ID}'
